modal.success.title: Success !
modal.success.decription: Your message has been received and we will be in touch with you shortly. Thank you for choosing 4TBF for your web and mobile development needs.
main.pretitle: Spark your success with our bright development solutions.
main.whywe.title: WHY WE
main.whywe.text: At our compnay, we believe that exceptional development is about more than just building websites or applications. It's about partnering with our clients to help them achieve their business goals and succeed online.We take pride in our work and are passionate about delivering high-quality web development services that exceed our clients' expectations. Our team of skilled developers, designers, and digital marketing experts have years of experience creating custom websites that are tailored to meet the unique needs of our clients.We believe in being transparent and collaborative throughout the entire web development process, from the initial consultation to the launch of the website and beyond. We listen to our clients' needs and goals, and work closely with them to create a website that reflects their brand, engages their target audience, and drives results.
main.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
main.faq.description: Here you will find answers to some of the most common questions we receive about our development services, pricing, process, and support.
main.faq.whatServices.question: What services do you offer?
main.faq.whatServices.answer: We offer a range of web development services, including custom website design, mobile app development, e-commerce solutions, and digital marketing.
main.faq.howMuchCost.question: How much do your services cost?
main.faq.howMuchCost.answer: The cost of our services varies depending on the scope and complexity of the project. We provide a free consultation and quote to all potential clients.
main.faq.howLong.question: How long does it take to complete a project?
main.faq.howLong.answer: The timeline for a project depends on several factors, including the scope, complexity, and client feedback. We provide a detailed project timeline and milestones at the start of each project.
main.faq.ogoing.question: Do you offer ongoing support and maintenance?
main.faq.ogoing.answer: Yes, we provide ongoing support and maintenance to ensure your website or application continues to perform optimally. We offer different support plans tailored to your specific needs.
main.faq.experience.question: What is your experience in web and mobile development?
main.faq.experience.answer: We have several years of experience in web and mobile development and have worked on projects for clients in various industries. Our team includes skilled professionals with expertise in different technologies and platforms.
main.faq.approach.question: What is your approach to project management?
main.faq.approach.answer: We follow an agile or scrum project management approach, which involves regular communication and collaboration with clients, continuous feedback and iterations, and a focus on delivering value and meeting deadlines.
main.faq.sets.question: What sets you apart from other development companies?
main.faq.sets.answer: Our unique value proposition includes our experience, expertise, dedication to quality and customer service, commitment to staying up-to-date with the latest technologies, and personalized attention to each client.
main.cases.title: Platform name
main.cases.nfcs.title: NFCS - Crypto, Futures, NFT and Stocks
main.cases.nfcs.subtitle: NFCS is a portal that will give you the opportunity to understand the world of Cryptocurrencies, Futures, NFT and Stocks and offer you the best way to invest your funds.
main.cases.investonus.title: Investonus
main.cases.investonus.subtitle: Investonus is a website that provides a crypto trading bot service to its users. This service allows users to automate their trading strategies and execute trades without requiring constant monitoring of the markets.
main.cases.qr.title: QR GENERATOR
main.cases.qr.subtitle: Allows you to quickly and easily generate custom QR codes for your business or personal use. Simply input your desired information, choose your design, and generate your code instantly
contact.field.name: Name
contact.description: Thank you for considering our development services. Our team of experts is ready to work with you to create a functional and visually stunning website or app that reflects your brand and achieves your business goals.
main.calculator.title: Calculate Cost
main.calculator.subtitle: Calculation of the cost of a website or application can be a complex process as it depends on various factors such as the type of website, its functionality, design, content and maintenance needs. We offer you options for calculating the cost of your website or application.
main.calculator.basic.title: Basic Calculator
main.calculator.basic.description: Estimates the cost of creating a simple website or application, with minimal requirements
main.calculator.advanced.title: Advanced Calculator
main.calculator.advanced.description: Estimates the cost of creating a more complex website or application, with the ability to customize complex options
calculator.subtitle: Go through all steps, discover the True Cost of Your Website or App
calculator.finalcalc.title: Final Calculation
calculator.finalcalc.subtitle: Approximate cost
calculator.finalcalc.text: If you want to make clarifications or know the details, please write your email below and click Submit
caclculator.basic.step.1.pages.title: Number of pages
caclculator.basic.step.1.pages.subtitle: Please select an approximate number of pages for your application.
caclculator.basic.step.1.pages.descripti: Selecting the number of pages will give you the opportunity to know the cost in more detail
caclculator.basic.step.1.copywrite.title: Copywriting of pages
caclculator.basic.step.1.copywrite.subti: Select the part of the pages that need copywriting
caclculator.basic.step.1.copywrite.descr: The copyright of a website page refers to the process of creating original content for a page. This may include writing text, creating original photos or videos, creating infographics or other graphics, or any other type of original content.
caclculator.basic.step.2.design.title: Style of design
caclculator.basic.step.2.design.subtitle: Choose a design style that best suits your users
caclculator.basic.step.2.design.descript: This refers to the overall aesthetic or visual design of a website page. There are various design styles, including minimalist, modern, retro, vintage and many more. Each style has its own characteristics and can convey different messages or feelings to visitors.
caclculator.basic.step.2.logo.title: Logo
caclculator.basic.step.2.logo.subtitle: The main purpose of a logo is to create a memorable visual representation of a brand or company
caclculator.basic.step.2.logo.descriptio: A unique symbol or design that represents a brand or company, essential for branding and identity, often includes text or graphics, designed to be easily recognizable and memorable, helps establish a brand identity and differentiate from competitors.
caclculator.basic.step.3.db.title: Database integration
caclculator.basic.step.3.db.subtitle: Boost Your Website's Performance with Database Integration
caclculator.basic.step.3.db.description: Implementing database integration to a website involves connecting to a database management system and creating a structure for storing, organizing, and retrieving data. This improves website performance, enhances user experience, and streamlines business processes.
caclculator.basic.step.3.form.title: Forms and emails
caclculator.basic.step.3.form.subtitle: Please choose which option of use of the forms and email newsletters is suitable for you.
caclculator.basic.step.3.form.descriptio: The forms will give you the opportunity to contact the client with you and email newsletters will notify users of changes or serve as advertising
caclculator.basic.step.4.commerce.title: E-Commerce
caclculator.basic.step.4.commerce.subtit: Creating a Seamless Online Shopping Experience with E-commerce
caclculator.basic.step.4.commerce.descri: The implementation of e-commerce on the website includes the creation of an online store that allows customers to view products, to add products to the shopping cart and to make secure payments. This requires the integration of product catalogs, shopping carts, payment gateways and order processing systems and for the effective implementation it is necessary a user-friendly interface, security and responsive customer support.
caclculator.basic.step.4.cms.title: CMS integration
caclculator.basic.step.4.cms.subtitle: Simplifying Website Management with a Content Management System (CMS)
caclculator.basic.step.4.cms.description: Implementing CMS to a website involves integrating software that allows website owners to easily create, manage, and publish digital content. This involves selecting a suitable CMS platform, customizing templates, and providing user training. Effective CMS implementation can improve website management efficiency, streamline content creation, and enhance website performance.
caclculator.basic.step.4.seo.title: SEO
caclculator.basic.step.4.seo.subtitle: Enhancing Your Website's Performance with Effective SEO Techniques
caclculator.basic.step.4.seo.description: Implementing SEO on a website includes optimizing the content and structure of a website to improve its visibility and ranking on search engine result pages. This requires implementation of keyword research, optimizing website content, improving website architecture and building quality backlinks.
about.title: Innovation, experience and dedication are the values of our website and application development company
about.subtitle: Your Trusted Partner for Development Services
about.part.1: At 4TBF, we are a team of experienced and passionate web and mobile application development professionals dedicated to building high quality websites for our clients. Our team includes developers, designers, testers and project managers who work together to deliver exceptional results for businesses of all sizes.
about.part.2: Our mission is to help our clients to achieve their online goals by providing them with a website that is not only visually stunning, but also user-friendly and functional. We understand that every business is unique, that is why we use a collaborative approach to development. We work closely with our clients to understand their needs, goals and target audience and then we design a custom website that reflects their brand and achieves their business goals.
about.part.3: With many years of experience in web and mobile app development, we have honed our skills and experience to ensure creation of high quality products that meet the needs of our clients. We are always up to date with the latest technologies and best practices in the field of development, to ensure that our clients get the best possible results.
about.part.4: We are proud of our commitment to our clients and do our best so that they are satisfied with the end result. Our goal is not only to meet our customers' expectations, but to exceed them. If you are looking for a reliable and experienced web development company to help you to achieve your online goals, look no further than 4TBF.
caclculator.advanced.step.1.pages.title: Number of pages
caclculator.advanced.step.1.pages.subtit: Please select an approximate number of pages for your application.
caclculator.advanced.step.1.pages.descri: Selecting the number of pages will give you the opportunity to know the cost in more detail
caclculator.advanced.step.1.copywrite.su: Select the part of the pages that need copywriting
caclculator.advanced.step.1.copywrite.de: The copyright of a website page refers to the process of creating original content for a page. This may include writing text, creating original photos or videos, creating infographics or other graphics, or any other type of original content.
caclculator.advanced.step.1.auth.title: Authorization / Registration
caclculator.advanced.step.1.auth.subtitl: Strengthening user confidence through efficient implementation of authorization/registration
caclculator.advanced.step.1.auth.descrip: The implementation of authorization and registration on the website includes the addition of a secure login system that allows users to access restricted content and features. This includes the implementation of user authentication and verification mechanisms.
caclculator.advanced.step.2.design.title: Style of design
caclculator.advanced.step.2.design.subti: Choose a design style that best suits your users
caclculator.advanced.step.2.design.descr: This refers to the overall aesthetic or visual design of a website page. There are various design styles, including minimalist, modern, retro, vintage and many more. Each style has its own characteristics and can convey different messages or feelings to visitors.
caclculator.advanced.step.2.logo.title: Logo
caclculator.advanced.step.2.logo.subtitl: The main purpose of a logo is to create a memorable visual representation of a brand or company
caclculator.advanced.step.2.logo.descrip: A unique symbol or design that represents a brand or company, essential for branding and identity, often includes text or graphics, designed to be easily recognizable and memorable, helps establish a brand identity and differentiate from competitors.
caclculator.advanced.step.2.animation.su: Choose which type of animation is suitable for your website or application
caclculator.advanced.step.2.mobile.title: Mobile and tablet friendly design
caclculator.advanced.step.2.mobile.subti: Be there, where your customers due to mobile and tablet friendly design
caclculator.advanced.step.2.mobile.descr: Mobile and tablet friendly design refers to a responsive website design that adjusts the layout and content to fit different screen sizes, and is essential for improving user experience and increasing website engagement on mobile and tablet devices.
caclculator.advanced.step.3.database.sub: Concept of Database Integration: Definition, Significance, and Process
caclculator.advanced.step.3.database.des: Database integration is the process of combining data from multiple sources into a single database. It helps organizations gain a complete view of their data, improve decision-making, reduce redundancy, and improve data consistency. It requires planning and consideration of factors such as data mapping, transformation, and cleansing.
caclculator.advanced.step.3.livetime.sub: Real-time Engagement: Enhancing User Experience with Live Chats and Notifications
caclculator.advanced.step.3.livetime.des: Real-time engagement involves using live chat and notifications to improve communication between businesses and customers. Live chat provides quick issue resolution and personalized assistance, while notifications alert users to important events. They are crucial for meeting consumer expectations and require careful planning, a user-friendly interface, and robust backend infrastructure.
caclculator.advanced.step.3.daysceduling: Allow your user to use functionality for time selection and temporary slot booking
Sending e-mails will help you to notify your users in more detail
caclculator.advanced.step.4.commerce.sub: Creating a Seamless Online Shopping Experience with E-commerce
caclculator.advanced.step.4.commerce.des: The implementation of e-commerce on the website includes the creation of an online store that allows customers to view products, to add products to the shopping cart and to make secure payments. This requires the integration of product catalogs, shopping carts, payment gateways and order processing systems and for the effective implementation it is necessary a user-friendly interface, security and responsive customer support.
Enhancing User Experience with Items Filtration and Categories

Items filtration and categories on a website enable users to easily browse and search for products by organizing them into specific categories and allowing users to filter items based on certain criteria, improving the user experience and increasing sales.
caclculator.advanced.step.4.checkout.sub: Ensuring a Seamless Items Checkout Experience for Customers
caclculator.advanced.step.4.checkout.des: Items checkout on a website refers to the process of finalizing a purchase, which should be smooth and efficient to ensure customer satisfaction, improve conversion rates, and increase revenue.
caclculator.advanced.step.5.form.title: Forms and emails
caclculator.advanced.step.5.form.subtitl: Please choose which option of use of the forms and email newsletters is suitable for you.
caclculator.advanced.step.5.form.descrip: The forms will give you the opportunity to contact the client with you and email newsletters will notify users of changes or serve as advertising
caclculator.advanced.step.5.roles.title: Users with different roles
caclculator.advanced.step.5.roles.subtit: User roles on a website allow different levels of access and permissions for administrators, moderators, and regular users. It can improve security and user experience.
caclculator.advanced.step.5.images.title: Images gallery
caclculator.advanced.step.5.images.subti: Visual Appeal: Enhancing Your Website with an Image Gallery
caclculator.advanced.step.5.images.descr: An image gallery on a website is a collection of images that can be displayed in various formats, such as thumbnails or a slideshow. It can be used to showcase products, services, or events, and can improve the visual appeal and user engagement of a website.
caclculator.advanced.step.5.blogreview.s: Insightful Content: Incorporating a Blog and Reviews Block on Your Website or App
caclculator.advanced.step.5.blogreview.d: A blog and reviews block on a website can provide valuable information and insights to users, whether it's through informative blog posts or customer reviews. It can also help to establish credibility and trust for the website, improve search engine rankings, and increase user engagement
caclculator.advanced.step.5.thirdpart.su: Third-party services can provide a cost-effective and time-saving solution for implementing advanced features on a website, such as chatbots, email marketing, or cloud storage.
caclculator.advanced.step.6.adminpanel.s: Powering Your Website or App with a Custom Admin Pane
caclculator.advanced.step.6.adminpanel.d: A custom admin panel is a back-end interface that is designed specifically for a website to allow its administrators to manage its content, data, and settings. It usually includes features such as user management, content editing, data analytics, and security settings. A custom admin panel is tailored to the specific needs of the website and can improve its efficiency and effectiveness in managing and updating its content
caclculator.advanced.step.6.multilanguag: Multilingual Support on Your Website or App: Expand Your Reach to a Global Audience
caclculator.advanced.step.6.cms.title: CMS integration
caclculator.advanced.step.6.cms.subtitle: Seamless Content Management: Exploring the Benefits and Costs of CMS Integration
caclculator.advanced.step.6.cms.descript: CMS allows businesses to easily create, manage, and distribute digital content across multiple platforms. With CMS, businesses can store all their digital content in a centralized location, and easily access and distribute it across websites, mobile apps, and other digital channels.
caclculator.advanced.step.7.seo.title: SEO
caclculator.advanced.step.7.seo.subtitle: Enhancing Your Website's Performance with Effective SEO Techniques
caclculator.advanced.step.7.seo.descript: Implementing SEO on a website includes optimizing the content and structure of a website to improve its visibility and ranking on search engine result pages. This requires implementation of keyword research, optimizing website content, improving website architecture and building quality backlinks.
caclculator.advanced.step.7.metric.title: Analytics metrics
caclculator.advanced.step.7.metric.subti: Unlocking Insights: Analytics Metrics for Your Website
caclculator.advanced.step.7.metric.descr: Analytics metrics on a website refer to the data and insights that are collected and analyzed to measure the performance and effectiveness of the website. This includes various metrics such as the number of visitors, bounce rate, conversion rate, traffic sources, and more.
caclculator.advanced.step.7.webvisor.sub: View clicks and other events on your website or application in video format
caclculator.advanced.step.7.webvisor.des: Webvisor is a tool used for website analysis that allows you to track user behavior on your site, providing visual click maps, scroll depth maps, and user session replays to help identify areas of improvement for your site's user experience.
caclculator.advanced.step.8.support.desc: Website or App support includes providing assistance and resolving issues related to the website's functionality, performance, and security.
caclculator.advanced.step.8.error.title: Application errors logger
caclculator.advanced.step.8.error.subtit: An application error logger is a software tool used to track and record errors and exceptions that occur within an application.
caclculator.advanced.step.8.protection.s: Secure your online presence with our website and application protection solutions
caclculator.advanced.step.8.protection.d: Protection against intruders on website or application involves implementing security measures such as firewalls, SSL/TLS encryption, two-factor authentication, and regular security audits to prevent unauthorized access, data breaches, and other security threats.
whywe.title: Why Choose Us?
whywe.subtitle: We believe that our success is tied to our clients' success. That's why we're always looking for new and innovative ways to help our clients achieve their goals online.
whywe.1.title: Latest technology
whywe.1.subtitle: Some of the best technologies we work with include DevOps architecture, BackEnd and FrontEnd methodologies for micro frontends and microservices and the latest design patterns.
whywe.1.subtitle.2: Using these powerful tools, we can create custom websites that are not only visually stunning, but also highly functional and easy for use.
whywe.2.title: Project transparency
whywe.2.subtitle: At 4TBF, we believe in transparency and collaboration when it comes to web development. That's why we make sure that our clients are always in the loop about the status of their projects, and that they have the opportunity to participate in every step of the development process.
whywe.3.title: Project Management and Releases
whywe.3.subtitle: One of the key benefits of working from Scrum or Agile methodologies is that we have regular release periods, typically every two weeks. This means that our clients can see real results from their projects on a regular basis, and have the opportunity to provide feedback and make changes along the way.
whywe.4.title: Unique team
whywe.4.subtitle: We create a new team for each project, made up of dedicated developers, designers, and project managers who work together to create a website that meets our clients' needs and exceeds their expectations.
services.title: Our services
services.description: At 4TBF, we offer a range of website or mobile app development services, including design, e-commerce development, mobile development, and SEO optimization.
services.mobile.title: Mobile App Development
services.mobile.subtitle: Seamless Integration with Your Business
services.web.title: Website Development
services.web.subtitle: High-Quality Websites Tailored to Your Needs
services.cloud.title: Cloud DevOps
services.cloud.subtitle: Harnessing the Power of Cloud for Your Business
services.ui.title: UI/UX design
services.ui.subtitle: Simplifying User Interactions with Intuitive Design
services.support.title: Support
services.support.subtitle: Tailored Support Solutions for Your Business
services.industry.title: Industries we serve
services.industry.subtitle: Successfully Delivered Digital Products
case.subtitle: The Case Studies page showcases our successful web and mobile development projects for various industries. We work closely with clients to understand their unique needs and goals, and we use our technical skills and creativity to create websites that are tailored to their specific requirements. Explore our Case Studies to see how we've helped businesses like yours succeed online.
cases.nfcs.title: NFCS Portal
cases.nfcs.description: Hit a line and our friendly folks will get back to you as soon as possible.
cases.nfcs: NFCS is a website that provides analytics and insights for NFTs, cryptocurrency, and stock markets. The website provides users with real-time data and analysis on market trends, pricing, trading volumes, and other key metrics, helping them make informed decisions about their investments. With a user-friendly interface and customizable dashboards, NFCS makes it easy for users to track their portfolios and stay up-to-date on the latest market developments. Whether you're a seasoned investor or just getting started, NFCS is a valuable tool for anyone looking to stay ahead in the fast-paced world of digital assets and financial markets.
cases.nfcs.card.first.title: Industry
cases.nfcs.card.second.title: Duration
cases.nfcs.card.third.title: Team Size
cases.nfcs.card.fourth.title: Technologies
cases.nfcs.aboutProject.title: About Project
cases.nfcs.about.project.info1: NFCS (NFT, Future, Crypto, Stock) Portal is a Forecast Analytics website, which gives users detailed analytics.
cases.nfcs.about.project.info2: We have a User Personal Token (UPT). Users can earn UPTs when they invite others and than they can pay with the tokens to buy forecasts. With this website, users don't need to worry about where to invest and how to get information about investment products. Users just need to order a forecast and the website will give them detailed analytics.
cases.nfcs.user.person.info: Based on interviews and user research I created personas and identified common pain points. Personas are fictional users whose goals and characteristics represent common needs .
cases.nfcs.user.person.name: Charles Viani
cases.nfcs.user.person.bio.title: B I O
cases.nfcs.user.person.bio.info: Charles has his own coffee shop and he likes painting. He has a big career plans for his future as a artwork collector. He wants to make some investments, to buy some NFT artworks and crypto tokens, but he doesn’t have time to study the markets.
cases.nfcs.user.person.painPoints1: Doesn’t know where to make investments
cases.nfcs.user.person.goals4: More info about the products he is interested in
cases.nfcs.user.person.goals5: Analytical info for a long time period
cases.nfcs.user.person.goals7: Affordable pricing, discounts and rewards programs
cases.nfcs.promocode.title: My Promocode
cases.nfcs.promocode.info: On this page users can see:
cases.nfcs.promocode.list.2: How many tokens they eraned from invites
cases.nfcs.promocode.list.3: How many tokens they have spent
cases.nfcs.promocode.description: Also, on the promocode page users can invite other people, see previous invites, and share their referral links.
cases.nfcs.forecast.title: Order Forecast
cases.nfcs.forecast.info.1: On this page users can order analytical forecasts.
cases.nfcs.forecast.info.2: Now there are 4 types of forecasts; Binance Futures, NFT, Stock, Crypto. Two others are coming soon.
cases.nfcs.howToBuyForecast.title: How Buy Forecast
cases.nfcs.howToBuyForecast.info.1: When a user clicks the 'order' button, a modal window appears where they can fill in the required information based on which the forecast is written. They can order on which asset they want to get a forecast. For example they can choose a Bitcoin forecast, a forecast for a certain NFT from a certain platform, etc.
cases.nfcs.howToBuyForecast.info.2: Forms are different for each forecast.
cases.nfcs.forecastList.title: Forecast List
cases.nfcs.forecastList.first.descriptio: There are 3 tabs, which show the  ordered forecast status.
cases.nfcs.forecastList.second.descripti: Wait List - When a user orders a forecast, it goes to the waiting list. Here they can see all the details of the order and its status.
Within three hours, they can receive the ready results.
cases.nfcs.forecastList.readyForecast: - When the 'waiting' status changes to 'done,' the order goes to the list of 'ready forecasts' so that a user will be able to buy it. There are three payment methods; crypto, USD, and UPT.
cases.nfcs.forecastList.yourForecast: - Here a user can preview and download the forecasts they bought.
cases.nfcs.siteMap.title: Site Map & Information Architecture
cases.nfcs.siteMap.description: Visual sitemaps are hierarchical diagram that shows the information architecture of a website. It gives you a visual representation of the site’s organization and how different sections are linked together.
cases.qr.description: Hit a line and our friendly folks will get back to you as soon as possible.
cases.qr.qrReview.first.title: Overview
cases.qr.qrReview.first.description: QR code generator is a mobile application that will allow users to share any type of information instantly. It may offer features such as the ability to add logos or other images to the code, as well as the ability to track the number of scans a code has received.
cases.qr.qrReview.second.title: Goals
cases.qr.qrReview.second.list.item.1: Our goal is to make an application that will make the information-sharing process easier and faster
cases.qr.qrReview.second.list.item.2: Create a competitive product that will match market needs
cases.qr.qrReview.main.title: Thoughts About Current
cases.qr.qrReview.main.description: QR Generators are very popular, and there are a lot of applications live and profit-making on App Store and Play Market. After a thorough research of the above-mentioned markets, surveys, interviews, and user feedbacks, I analyzed the whole information and created the design of the app.
cases.qr.qrWireframes.title: Wireframes
cases.qr.qrWireframes.color.description: The app is designed in minimalistic, clean and intuitive style. I considered users of different ages and paid big attention to accessibility.
cases.qr.qrSteps.createQR.title: Create QR Code
cases.qr.qrSteps.createQR.info: The app has simple and functional flow: the user can create QR with Text , Link or Contact info.
cases.qr.qrSteps.createQR.description: This platform differs from the competitors by not limiting the number of characters in the text. Instead, we notify them about the difficulties of QR recognition when the content exceeds 150 characters.
cases.qr.qrSteps.scanQR.title: Scan QR
cases.qr.qrSteps.scanQR.info: The user can scan QR after allowing camera use. As it’s known, depending on the operation system flow, the users need to allow the camera to take a picture.
cases.qr.qrSteps.qrHistory.title: Find The History Of Your QRs
cases.qr.qrSteps.qrHistory.description: The users can also find the history of their created and scanned QRs, and edit already created dinamic QRs .
cases.qr.qrSteps.qrHistory.info.item: View all details and statistics about your QR
cases.investonus: Investonus is a website that provides a crypto trading bot service to its users. This service allows users to automate their trading strategies and execute trades without requiring constant monitoring of the markets. Users can pay a fee to access the trading bot, which is built on advanced machine learning algorithms. These algorithms analyze real-time market data and trends to identify profitable trading opportunities.
cases.qr: The QR Generator app is a powerful tool that allows users to create customized QR codes and VCards. With this app, users can quickly generate a QR code for any purpose, including links to websites, email addresses, phone numbers, and more. The app also supports VCard generation, allowing users to create digital business cards that can be easily shared and saved by others.
cases.listInHive: List in Hive is a dynamic and responsive online marketplace that redefines the way individuals engage in buying or selling dealings. At List in Hive, we've curated a platform where users can seamlessly buy and sell across a diverse spectrum of categories, including real estate, vehicles, job opportunities, services, and businesses. Our user-friendly interface ensures a smooth and intuitive experience, empowering individuals to showcase their offerings and find precisely what they're looking for. Whether you're on the lookout for your dream home, seeking a new vehicle, exploring career opportunities, or eager to showcase your services and businesses, List in Hive is the go-to destination. We prioritize security and user satisfaction, providing a space where our vibrant community can connect, transact, and thrive. Join us in shaping the future of online commerce at List in Hive – where possibilities unfold with every click.
cases.listInHive.title: LIST IN HIVE
cases.listInHive.subtitle: Hit a line and our friendly folks will get back to you as soon as possible.
listInHive.home.subtitle: List in Hive is a dynamic and responsive online marketplace that redefines the way individuals engage in buying or selling  across a diverse spectrum of categories, including real estate, vehicles, job opportunities, services, and businesses.
listInHive.userInfo: Patrick Brun is a driven entrepreneur with expertise in real estate and a passion for diverse business ventures. He values efficiency, transparency, and profitability in his transactions, and helps individuals to trade their properties.
listInHive.userInfo.bio.text: Meet Patrick Brun, a driven entrepreneur with a passion for real estate and business ventures. With a background in property management and a keen eye for investment opportunities, Patrick navigates the dynamic world of buying and selling properties with finesse. His entrepreneurial spirit extends beyond real estate; he's always on the lookout for promising business ventures and opportunities to expand his portfolio. As an avid networker, Patrick values platforms like ours at List In Hive Company, where he can seamlessly connect with potential buyers, sellers, and partners across various industries. Whether he's scouting for his next investment property, seeking to offload a business he's outgrown, or exploring new avenues for collaboration, Patrick relies on our platform's robust features and user-friendly interface to streamline his transactions and maximize his success.
listInHive.userInfo.painPoints.points: P O I N T S
listInHive.userInfo.painPoints.1: Juggling multiple platforms for different deal-finding is time-consuming.
listInHive.userInfo.painPoints.2: Verifying the credibility and trustworthiness of counterparties proves challenging.
listInHive.userInfo.painPoints.3: Staying updated with market trends and industry developments demands significant effort.
listInHive.userInfo.goals.2: Optimize business operations by leveraging the platform.
listInHive.userInfo.goals.3: Cultivate meaningful partnerships within the industry.
listInHive.design.home.title: Home Page
listInHive.design.home.subtitle: On our vibrant homepage, dive into the world of TOP CATEGORIES, ranging from Real Estate and Vehicles to Jobs, Business for Sale, and beyond. Want a deeper look? Simply click on the 'Show more' button or head to the header and click 'Choose Categories' for a detailed view. Our elastic search feature ensures you quickly discover the listings you're after, and with location-based filtering, finding what's right around the corner has never been easier. Excitingly, our Home page and main header serve as your gateway to add your listings to our dynamic online marketplace.
listInHive.design.listing.title: Add Listing
listInHive.design.listing.subtitle: Adding your offerings is as easy as a breeze with our user-friendly 'Add a Listing' button. Simply choose the main category and sub-category that best fits your listing, and let our intuitive platform guide you through the rest. Our prompted form ensures you cover all the essential details, while our AI-powered system crafts an appealing description effortlessly. Once you've perfected your listing, take a sneak peek with our 'View Your Listing' feature. Worried about quality? Don't be! Each listing undergoes a swift moderation process to maintain a smooth user experience. Your journey on List in Hive starts with a click – add your listing today and let the deals begin!
listInHive.design.ai.title: Listing Description Generation with AI
listInHive.design.ai.subtitle: Introducing a groundbreaking feature like AI-generated listings descriptions on List in Hive is an exciting leap forward in user experience. Now, effortlessly craft compelling and accurate descriptions for your listings with the power of artificial intelligence. Our innovative AI-driven tool analyzes the unique attributes of your listing, ensuring that every detail is captured eloquently. Say goodbye to the hassle of manual description creation – List in Hive's AI seamlessly translates your listing information into engaging narratives, saving you time and enhancing the overall quality of your listings.
listInHive.design.ad.title: Place Your Ad
listInHive.design.ad.subtitle: Boost your business visibility with List in Hive's exclusive offer! Now, you can effortlessly place your ad on our platform with FREE professionally designed banners by our team. Tailor your advertising strategy by choosing prime locations such as Home top, middle, and footer, as well as on the Search page and each individual listings page. We put the power in your hands – select where you want to target your audience and watch your reach grow immediately. Share your business goals with us, and our team will craft an advertising experience that perfectly highlights your brand. Don't miss this opportunity to stand out – let's make your business shine on List in Hive! The ad dimensions are shown below:
listInHive.design.reviews.title: Reviews
listInHive.design.reviews.subtitle: At List in Hive, your voice matters! Share your experiences and thoughts by leaving reviews for users offering services, real estate, or vehicles. Rate them with stars to reflect your satisfaction level, and watch as your feedback contributes to our vibrant community. We value open communication, so users have the opportunity to respond to reviews only once, fostering a constructive dialogue. Rest assured, each review undergoes moderation to maintain a positive and authentic environment. Your insights help shape our community, creating a space where trust and transparency thrive. Join us in building a supportive network on List in Hive—because your opinion counts!
404.title: You’ve lost in space.
404.subtitle: We can’t find the page that you are looking for.
invesTonus.title: Investonus
invesTonus.subtitle: Crypto Trader Bot: Stable Interest and Daily Income.
invesTonus.aboutProject.title: About Project
invesTonus.about.project.info1: Investonus.pro is a cutting-edge website that offers a revolutionary crypto trading bot. With our platform, users can add their funds and watch as our advanced bot algorithm trades for them. Each day, users receive their earnings, and they can easily cash out their profits.
invesTonus.about.project.info2: Our platform offers different investment types with varying costs and daily rates, providing users with flexibility and options to suit their investment needs. As users invest more and grow their portfolio, they unlock even greater benefits. Once a user reaches an investment of $20,000, they become a GROSS user and double their daily income. This exclusive status is reserved for our most dedicated investors who are committed to growing their wealth.
invesTonus.user.person.info: InvesTonus is a crypto investment bot designed to help individuals and businesses optimize their cryptocurrency investments. With InvesTonus, users can connect their cryptocurrency exchange accounts and let the bot automatically trade on their
invesTonus.user.person.bio.title: B I O
invesTonus.user.person.bio: John is a successful businessman in his mid-30s who is interested in investing his money in the cryptocurrency market. However, he is too busy with his work and personal life to devote the time and effort required to learn about the crypto market and make informed trading decisions. John is looking for a hassle-free investment platform that can generate reliable profits for him with minimal input on his part.
invesTonus.user.person.painPoints: P A I N  P O I N T S
invesTonus.user.person.info1.painPoints: Lack of time and knowledge to monitor the cryptocurrency market and make informed trading decisions.
invesTonus.user.person.info2.painPoints: Concerns about the security and reliability of investment platforms.
invesTonus.user.person.info3.painPoints: High risk associated with the volatile cryptocurrency market.
invesTonus.user.person.info4.painPoints: Difficulty tracking and managing investment performance and profits.
invesTonus.user.person.info1.goals: Generate a reliable and stable source of passive income through cryptocurrency trading.
invesTonus.user.person.info2.goals: Invest in the cryptocurrency market with minimal effort and time commitment.
invesTonus.user.person.info3c.goals: Monitor and manage investment performance and profits easily and transparently.
invesTonus.design.title: Design
invesTonus.design.user.cen.see: On this page users can see:
invesTonus.design.user.cen.see.2: How many tokens they earned from invites
invesTonus.design.user.cen.see.3: How many tokens they have spent
invesTonus.design.dashboard.info.1: Also, on the promocode page users can invite other people, see previous invites, and share their referral links.
invesTonus.design.add.money.info: Users can choose the amount to add, pay immediately through the Metamask wallet and see on the calculator how much is still not enough to invest in order to reach the next goal
invesTonus.design.dashboard.info.2: Users will be able to see their investments, investment status, daily percentage, balance, investment and payout calendar
invesTonus.userInfo.details.name: Henry Wilson
cookie.banner.info.detail: We use our own and third-party cookies to personalize content to analyze web traffic.
process.hero.title: Get your desired digital experience efficiently.
process.about.subtitle: Dedicated Team
process.about.title: Agile-oriented professionals
process.about.processPrefacTitle: You will get a proven process with enough flexibility to receive your World-Class Digital Experience on-time and on-budget. A dedicated team of professionals will guide you through every step using top project-management tools.
process.detail.onboarding.description: We always like to begin with some face-to-face time. During the project onboarding, you’ll meet your Project Manager who will guide you through our process and tools. Our goal is to make sure that you will get complete transparency over the project duration.
process.detail.discover.description: This is where the real magic happens. During this workshop-style process, we’ll conduct a deep dive into your company's profile, your goals, and your target audience’s needs. Your dedicated team’s UX Designer will outline the primary objectives and prepare a project scope, budget, and timeline for your review.
process.detail.ux.ui.description: Once you’ve signed off, the Designers take their cue. Using Sketch and Invision, we’ll prepare layouts for the developing products and gather your feedback along the way. Additionally, our Developer works in tandem with the Designers to discover the best solutions. This cohesiveness allows the next phase of the process to flourish.
process.detail.implementation.descriptio: With each approved layout, the Developer will build what the Designer has envisioned. It’s this duet that allows us to efficiently craft your dream digital product. Additionally, our QA (quality assurance) ensures all bugs are detected and fixed prior to your review.
process.detail.deploy.description: When everything is tested and validated with you under our internal environment, we are good to go! We help you to choose the right hosting or cloud architecture provider for your new digital product. We optimize the performance of your website – making sure it works smoothly on desktop and mobile devices (and that Google loves it!). Then, it’s time to show it to the larger audience.
process.detail.care.optimize.description: Once your product is built and live, we’re there to help in every way, shape, or form. Website maintenance, SEO or UX optimization, enhanced security measures, new features — you name it. We’re your team, and we’ll stick with you until the end.
process.detail.care.optimize.phase.deliv: We set the deliverables of this phase together, to make sure we cover you on every side.
